Package com.madrobot.hardware Description

Device hardware(Sensors,Accessories) querying and reporting utilities.

Queries device paramters like

  • Software related information like Kernel/Firmware version.
  • Display Information like Density,Dimension, Refresh rate etc.
  • Sensor information
  • Network information
